$sql

Initial value:

 'SELECT debtortrans.type,
                debtortrans.transno,
                debtortrans.ovamount,
                debtortrans.alloc,
                SUM(custallocns.amt) AS totallocfrom
        FROM debtortrans,
                custallocns
        WHERE transid_allocfrom=debtortrans.id
        GROUP BY debtortrans.type,
                debtortrans.transno,
                debtortrans.ovamount,
                debtortrans.alloc
        HAVING SUM(custallocns.amt) < -alloc'
